### Government Tender Announcement
### Strategic and Operational Support for POLAR Canada
=====================================================

### Overview
POLAR Canada operates the Canadian High Arctic Research Station (CHARS) and conducts cutting-edge Arctic research. POLAR Canada is seeking strategic and operational support to advance its organizational maturity.

### Service Requirements
POLAR Canada requires HR consultants with expertise in organizational design and classification. The consultant will review the organization's HR strategy, develop an organizational structure, and create a classification model. The consultant must consider the cultural and geographical context of the region and support the acceleration of POLAR Canada's strategic priorities.

### Service Objectives
* Review POLAR Canada's HR strategy and operating principles
* Develop an organizational HR structure
* Create a classification model that supports talent attraction and retention in the northern context
* Integrate stakeholder and community consultation into the approach
* Provide a full life cycle cost estimate for implementing and operating the classification model

### Eligibility
This opportunity is open to all suppliers who can demonstrate expertise in human resources consulting and organizational design and classification. Suppliers must be registered on the Task and Solutions Professional Services – Tasked Based Supply Arrangement E60ZT-18TSPS.
